content.question: (a) Describe a procedure for identifying potential outliers, and use the procedure to decide whether there are outliers among the responses for the money spent on textbooks. (b) Based on the stemplot, write a few sentences describing the distribution of money spent on textbooks for the 34 students.

frqParts.text: (a) Describe a procedure for identifying potential outliers, and use the procedure to decide whether there are outliers among the responses for the money spent on textbooks. (b) Based on the stemplot, write a few sentences describing the distribution of money spent on textbooks for the 34 students.

topic.text: 1.6: Describing the Distribution of a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
